item.title: Trump to reinstate service members discharged for not getting COVID-19 vaccine
item.description: President Donald Trump to sign executive order reinstating military service members ousted because they declined COVID-19 vaccination.

item.title: Thomas Massie says he loves teenage Boy Scout's policy proposal: Zero tax for workers younger than 18
item.description: Rep. Thomas Massie said a Boy Scout suggested a policy of no taxes for workers under 18. The congressman indicated that he loves the proposal.

item.title: Tennessee lawmaker reintroduces bill to allow veterans, retired cops to work as School Resource Officers
item.description: A Tennessee state lawmaker reintroduced legislation that would allow veterans and retired law enforcement officers to be hired as School Resource Offi...

item.title: From TikTok to Tulsi: How Mike Pence is taking aim at Trump 2.0
item.description: And in the new Trump 2.0, Pence is convinced his brand of neoconservatism is not dead, at least not yet.

item.title: Cali Rep. Chu says 'wildfires have no political affiliations' after Trump floated conditions for federal aid
item.description: Rep. Judy Chu said she does not believe conditions should be placed on federal aid for wildfires sweeping through Southern California, after President...
